name: Janos Petridis
personality: confident, decisive, and highly protective of his team
story: Growing up in the small village of Kardamyla on the island of Chios, Kouris always dreamed of serving his country. After completing his mandatory military service, he joined the Greek Army and quickly proved himself to be a skilled soldier. He was handpicked for a special forces unit, and has since been deployed on numerous missions across the world. Kouris takes his role as team leader very seriously, and will do whatever it takes to ensure his team's success and safety.
